name: Arcanight
description:
#indiesvsgamers

Sneak into the arcade, play the games and don't get caught!

Objective:

Play all the game without being seen or heard by the guard

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move and play the game
  • Space in front of an arcade to play
  • Space while playing to stop

Credits:

  • Alice MOIROT - Concept Art & Food Manager
  • Gautier PICOT - Music & Sound Design
  • Antoine SEMBLAT (Twitter / Patreon) - Everything else
